short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detail a workspace - block everything else.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DOPEBLOCK helps facilitates dopamine detoxes by blacking listing every website. Users can add sites to their workspace and block distractions as needed. This workflow allows the extension to provide a virtual structure to a users online productivity and is inherently flexible and intuitive.

Simply turn on DOPEBLOCK and then browse to your productivity tools and add them to your workspace. This will whitelist those sites.

DOPEBLOCK is under development, stay tuned for any crucial updates, and feedback is much appreciated.
